companyAddressOnCheck: Company address to print on checks
getPaymentProductError: Error while fetching payment products. Please try again or contact the Customer Success team if the problem persists.
noAccounts: Please connect accounts by navigating to settings > financial institutions
checkActivationSuccess: You can now make invoice payments to suppliers from the registered account using checks. Visit the payables module to start making payments.
LinkErrorMsg: Unexpected error occurred, please try again. Contact our Customer Success team if the problem persists.
checkActivation: <ourLink></ourLink> to learn more about sending check payments with Centime
noCheckPayment: This account is not eligible for {{paymentType}} payments
cardActivationSuccess: You can now make invoice payments to suppliers from the registered credit card. Visit the payables module to start making payments.
cardActivation: <ourLink></ourLink> about how you can use your credit card in Centime and the benefits
BFCCardSuccess: Use your credit card to pay any supplier, even those that don't accept credit cards
BFCSuccess: Centime will simply use your credit card as the funding source and send the payment to the supplier via ACH
NonBFCCardSuccess: Use your credit card to pay card-accepting suppliers
NonBFCSuccess: You will be reminded to pay your suppliers on the scheduled date and mark invoices as paid
defaultCheckLabel: Make this the default account for check payments
defaultCreditCardLabel: Make this the default account for credit card
applicationHelperText: If you need help with your application, please contact our Customer Success team
BFORequired: Centime is required by law to collect ownership and control information for your company. You will be able to apply for Centime's payment and credit solutions once you submit this information.
